## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5d4ed62610cb1f85461086bc8a3e516fd972d562d2803310f2a5bcc91d414c91)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'naftis' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
